v-model:active.description: Bind the identifier of the currently selected tag
v-model:active.description_zh: 绑定当前选中标签的标识符

type.description_zh: 样式风格类型，可选值为 card

duration.description: Animation time, in seconds, is set to 0 to disable animation
duration.description_zh: 动画时间，单位秒，设置为 0 可以禁用动画

line-width.description: The bottom bar width, default unit px
line-width.description_zh: 底部条宽度，默认单位 px

line-height.description: The height of the bottom bar, the default unit is px
line-height.description_zh: 底部条高度，默认单位 px

animated.description: Whether to enable transitions when switching tab content
animated.description_zh: 是否开启切换标签内容时的转场动画

border.description: Whether or not to display the outer border of the tab bar, only when 'type="line"' is displayed
border.description_zh: 是否显示标签栏外边框，仅在 `type="line"` 时有效

ellipsis.description: Whether or not to omit excessively long title text
ellipsis.description_zh: 是否省略过长的标题文字

sticky.description: Whether or not to use a sticky layout

shrink.description: Whether to enable the left shrink layout
shrink.description_zh: 是否开启左侧收缩布局

swipeable.description: Whether to enable gesture left and right swipe switching
swipeable.description_zh: 是否开启手势左右滑动切换

lazy-render.description: Whether to turn on deferred rendering (content rendering is triggered when switching to a tag for the first time)
lazy-render.description_zh: 是否开启延迟渲染（首次切换到标签时才触发内容渲染）

scrollspy.description: Whether to turn on scrolling navigation

offset-top.description: The distance from the top of the ceiling under the sticky layout, supporting 'px' 'vw' 'vh' 'rem' units, default px
offset-top.description_zh: 粘性布局下吸顶时与顶部的距离，支持 `px` `vw` `vh` `rem` 单位，默认 px

swipe-threshold.description: Scrolling threshold, when the number of labels exceeds the threshold and the total width exceeds the width of the tab bar, horizontal scrolling begins
swipe-threshold.description_zh: 滚动阈值，标签数量超过阈值且总宽度超过标签栏宽度时开始横向滚动

title-active-color.description: The title is selected in color

title-inactive-color.description: The title is the default state color

before-change.description: The callback function before switching tags, returning 'false' to prevent switching, supports returning Promise
before-change.description_zh: 切换标签前的回调函数，返回 `false` 可阻止切换，支持返回 Promise

events.name: click-tab
events.description: Triggered when a tag is clicked
events.params: 点击标签时触发
events.description_zh: 点击标签时触发

events.name: change
events.description: Triggers when the currently active tag changes
events.params: 当前激活的标签改变时触发
events.description_zh: 当前激活的标签改变时触发

events.name: rendered
events.description: Triggered when tag content is rendered for the first time (only when deferred rendering is enabled)
events.params: 标签内容首次渲染时触发（仅在开启延迟渲染后触发）
events.description_zh: 标签内容首次渲染时触发（仅在开启延迟渲染后触发）

events.name: scroll
events.description: Triggered on scrolling, only in sticky mode
events.params: 滚动时触发，仅在 sticky 模式下生效
events.description_zh: 滚动时触发，仅在 sticky 模式下生效

events.name: 参数
events.description: illustrate
events.params: 说明
events.description_zh: 说明

events.name: v-model:active
events.description: Bind the identifier of the currently selected tag
events.params: 绑定当前选中标签的标识符
events.description_zh: 绑定当前选中标签的标识符

events.name: type
events.description: Style style type, optionally card
events.params: 样式风格类型，可选值为 card
events.description_zh: 样式风格类型，可选值为 card

events.name: color
events.description: Tag accent color
events.params: 标签主题色
events.description_zh: 标签主题色

events.name: background
events.description: Tab bar background color
events.params: 标签栏背景色
events.description_zh: 标签栏背景色

events.name: duration
events.description: Animation time, in seconds, is set to 0 to disable animation
events.params: 动画时间，单位秒，设置为 0 可以禁用动画
events.description_zh: 动画时间，单位秒，设置为 0 可以禁用动画

events.name: line-width
events.description: The bottom bar width, default unit px
events.params: 底部条宽度，默认单位 px
events.description_zh: 底部条宽度，默认单位 px

events.name: line-height
events.description: The height of the bottom bar, the default unit is px
events.params: 底部条高度，默认单位 px
events.description_zh: 底部条高度，默认单位 px

events.name: animated
events.description: Whether to enable transitions when switching tab content
events.params: 是否开启切换标签内容时的转场动画
events.description_zh: 是否开启切换标签内容时的转场动画

events.name: border
events.description: Whether or not to display the outer border of the tab bar, only when 'type="line"' is displayed
events.params: 是否显示标签栏外边框，仅在 `type="line"` 时有效
events.description_zh: 是否显示标签栏外边框，仅在 `type="line"` 时有效

events.name: ellipsis
events.description: Whether or not to omit excessively long title text
events.params: 是否省略过长的标题文字
events.description_zh: 是否省略过长的标题文字

events.name: sticky
events.description: Whether or not to use a sticky layout
events.params: 是否使用粘性布局
events.description_zh: 是否使用粘性布局

events.name: shrink
events.description: Whether to enable the left shrink layout
events.params: 是否开启左侧收缩布局
events.description_zh: 是否开启左侧收缩布局

events.name: swipeable
events.description: Whether to enable gesture left and right swipe switching
events.params: 是否开启手势左右滑动切换
events.description_zh: 是否开启手势左右滑动切换

events.name: lazy-render
events.description: Whether to turn on deferred rendering (content rendering is triggered when switching to a tag for the first time)
events.params: 是否开启延迟渲染（首次切换到标签时才触发内容渲染）
events.description_zh: 是否开启延迟渲染（首次切换到标签时才触发内容渲染）

events.name: scrollspy
events.description: Whether to turn on scrolling navigation
events.params: 是否开启滚动导航
events.description_zh: 是否开启滚动导航

events.name: offset-top
events.description: The distance from the top of the ceiling under the sticky layout, supporting 'px' 'vw' 'vh' 'rem' units, default px
events.params: 粘性布局下吸顶时与顶部的距离，支持 `px` `vw` `vh` `rem` 单位，默认 px
events.description_zh: 粘性布局下吸顶时与顶部的距离，支持 `px` `vw` `vh` `rem` 单位，默认 px

events.name: swipe-threshold
events.description: Scrolling threshold, when the number of labels exceeds the threshold and the total width exceeds the width of the tab bar, horizontal scrolling begins
events.params: 滚动阈值，标签数量超过阈值且总宽度超过标签栏宽度时开始横向滚动
events.description_zh: 滚动阈值，标签数量超过阈值且总宽度超过标签栏宽度时开始横向滚动

events.name: title-active-color
events.description: The title is selected in color
events.params: 标题选中态颜色
events.description_zh: 标题选中态颜色

events.name: title-inactive-color
events.description: The title is the default state color
events.params: 标题默认态颜色
events.description_zh: 标题默认态颜色

events.name: before-change
events.description: The callback function before switching tags, returning 'false' to prevent switching, supports returning Promise
events.params: 切换标签前的回调函数，返回 `false` 可阻止切换，支持返回 Promise
events.description_zh: 切换标签前的回调函数，返回 `false` 可阻止切换，支持返回 Promise
